5x Wheat = Bread
10x Corn = Bag of popcorn
20x Potato = Bag of potato's

100x Carrot = Carrot soup
5x Wheat + 2x Pig meat = Sandwhich
10x Corn + 10x Sugarcane = Sweet popcorn
20x Potato + 20x Carrot = Vegetable soup

Welcome to Relaxing Sounds
------------------------------------------------------------------

Rain Sound: `!relax rain sound`

Nightingale and other bird sounds: `!relax bird sound`

The sound of wind and snow: `!relax sound of wind`

The sound of the water in the stream: `!relax sound of water`

All sounds in nature: `!relax mixed sounds`

------------------------------------------------------------------
**

actions.message:
***!!funembed         For fun commands list
!!infoembed           For info about the server           
!!farmembed           Farming commands :)
!!moderationembed     Moderation commands
!!levelembed          Level commands
!!imageembed          Get images/avtar***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***
!!slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
!!flipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
!!genNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
!!gold                   Display's the user's gold
!!gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
!!kill                   To kill any user
!!steal [@user]          To steal the user gold
!!rps                     Play rock paper scissiors
!!marry [@user]          Marry with the mentioned user
!!divorce                Divorce with your partner
!!marriage               Check your marriage status  
!!lovecalc               Check love calc between two users                    
***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***
!!sendEmbed              Sends an embed message
!!userInfo               Displays the user's information
!!channelInfo            Displays the channel's information
!!roleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
!!afk [reason]           Set you afk
!!setupwelcome           Send message when new user join***
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
***!!avatarhelp               Lists available commands
!!getavatar          Sends the user's avatar image
!!getusercard        Sends avatar with username on it
!!getimage [url]     Sends the image from the URL
!!invertimage [url]  Inverts the image linked in the URL
!!rotateimage [url]  Rotates the image 120 degrees
!!resizeimage [url]  Shrinks the image by 50%***
actions.name: Set Embed Description
